metadata.synopsis: The guard points the player towards the execution room after they first enter the tower.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter Moonrise Towers, walk past S_MOO_BazEntranceGuard_002 (before execution is complete).Will only play once.

0.speaker: Zealot Brinn
0.text: Another True Soul. The Disciple will want to see you - through the main doors.
